message: This offer lets you get a good chunk of the money now, Bob. Every round it loses value for both of us, but especially for you!
This is a fair split. Take it, or we both lose more in the next round.
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable.  We're both losing money with every round. This offer still gives you a sizable chunk.
Alice, we're both losing value with every round. This is the best we can do. Take it or risk losing even more.
Bob, this is a slight concession on my part, but time is running out.  Let's agree on this and walk away with something substantial.
Alice, we're getting closer to the end. This is a fair offer, considering the time we're wasting.
Bob, this is it. A 50/50 split. Let's end this before we both lose out.
